hint: Does the word 'You' refer to a vast group of people, or a specific person standing right here?
explanation: "You" refers to a specific individual (the listener), so we use lowercase "u". The phrase "the cleanest biologist" also picks out a specific individual (like saying "the tallest person"), so we use lowercase "b". In logic, lowercase = specific individual, UPPERCASE = a class or category of things.
visual_concept: Two sizes: lowercase letters are single people (you can point at them), UPPERCASE letters are groups/crowds inside circles (you point at the whole group).
